headline: PPL Equity Units Fuel Expanded Grid Spend For Hyperscaler Data Demand
summary: PPL Corporation (NYSE:PPL) has launched a $1b public offering of Equity Units. The company has raised its four year capital expenditure plan. New spending is centered on grid upgrades to support hyperscaler data centers and large load customers. PPL is working with Blackstone Infrastructure in a joint venture focused on supplying power to hyperscalers. The company is also expanding interconnection agreements with large power users.
